div.style: font-family: 微软雅黑; text-align: center; font-size: 13px; vertical-align: middle; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; line-height: 16px; width: 417px; word-break: break-word; border: 0px;

font-family: 微软雅黑; text-align: center; font-size: 13px; vertical-align: middle; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-weight: 700; font-style: italic; line-height: 16px; width: 131px; word-break: break-word; border: 0px;

vertical-align: top; text-align: center; color: rgb(50, 50, 50); line-height: 16px; font-size: 13px; font-family: 微软雅黑; white-space: nowrap; display: inline-block; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;
